name: Better Offer
description:
Introduction

This canyon is described in limited detail in Canyons Near Sydney by Rick Jamieson. Help the Australian canyoning community by contributing track notes to ropewiki.com

Originally known as Magnifying Glass Canyon.

Quality

  • The canyon is rated 3 out of 10 on the Brennan Quality Scale.
  • David Noble rates the canyon 2 out of 5 for quality and Medium for difficulty.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

  • OzUltimate.com : Better Offer Canyon track notes

Trip reports and media

{{#ev:youtube|Rpt5s9hgsJA}}

  • Sleep When We're Dead : MAGNIFYING GLASS CANYON. AKA BETTER OFFER. 29-10-2016
  • YouTube.com : Richard Pattison, Better Offer Canyon movie

{{#ev:youtube|V13ZW5LoKoQ}}

Background

Craig Flynn says: Legend has it that when offered the choice between a romantic date with her new boy friend or a trip down Magnifying Glass canyon one particular Rover ditched the love interest and chose the later. Thus Magnifying Glass canyon has come to be better known as Better Offer Canyon.
